title: Daily time spent watching television in Germany 1997 to 2019
summary: In general Daily viewing time in minutes has stayed the same over the Year.
Daily viewing time in minutes is roughly decreasing from 2010 to 2012, roughly constant from 2012 to 2016, and finally gradually decreasing from 2016 to 2018.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
The highest Daily viewing time in minutes, of value 225.0 was reached at Year 2011
The lowest Daily viewing time in minutes, of value 217.0 was reported at Year 2018
min_summary: Overall Daily viewing time in minutes has decreased over the Year.
